first_para: Emily Brothers (born 1964, Merseyside) is a British Labour politician who has been selected to fight the Sutton and Cheam constituency in the 2015 General Election. She is the world's first politician to be blind and openly transgender, and is believed to be the first openly transgender person to run for Westminster from the Labour Party.

full.extract: Emily Brothers (born 1964, Merseyside) is a British Labour politician who has been selected to fight the Sutton and Cheam constituency in the 2015 General Election. She is the world's first politician to be blind and openly transgender, and is believed to be the first openly transgender person to run for Westminster from the Labour Party.
full.title: Emily Brothers
